project.description: Checks if stop_master.sh and start_master.sh work properly.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo /opt/vappio-scripts/stop_master.sh
node=`cat /mnt/clovr/runtime/node_type` if [ $node != "OFFLINE" ]; then echo "node is $node" echo "error, node should be offline" exit 1 fi
sudo /opt/vappio-scripts/start_master.sh
node2=`cat /mnt/clovr/runtime/node_type` if [ $node2 != "MASTER_NODE" ]; then echo "node is $node2" echo "error, node should be MASTER_NODE" exit 1 fi
